subject: Anybody using JUnit with ATG Dynamo?
msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I m looking for hints and advice on how to write unit test for systems built on ATG Dynamo.  I ve done some very basic droplet tests in JUnit, but
messageBody:
Anybody using JUnit with ATG Dynamo?

Hi everyone,

I'm looking for hints and advice on how to write unit test for systems built on ATG Dynamo.  I've done some very basic droplet tests in JUnit, but I need something more robust and complete.  Can HttpUnit handle it?  Has anyone used one of these tools to test a full Dynamo website?  Unit tests of JHTML pages?

Any advice would be welcome.  Respond to me, I'll summarize to the list if others are interested.

Thanks,

.T.


Todd Jonker
ZEFER Pittsburgh
